combat-gear.name: Padded Armor
combat-gear.description: A sturdy armor to protect you from enemy blows.

combat-gear.name: Leather Armor
combat-gear.description: Flexible yet protective, leather armor offers a good balance of mobility and defense.

combat-gear.name: Studded Leather Armor
combat-gear.description: Reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes, this armor is a favorite of rogue adventurers.

combat-gear.name: Hide Armor
combat-gear.description: Made from thick furs and pelts, hide armor is primitive but offers decent protection.

combat-gear.name: Chain Shirt
combat-gear.description: This shirt made of interlocking metal rings offers solid protection with minimal encumbrance.

combat-gear.name: Scale Mail
combat-gear.description: Consisting of a coat and leggings covered in overlapping pieces of metal, this armor provides excellent protection.

combat-gear.name: Breastplate
combat-gear.description: This metal armor covers the wearer's front and back, combining protection with agility.

combat-gear.name: Half Plate Armor
combat-gear.description: Offers substantial protection while allowing for the mobility of the wearer. Preferred by adventurers who can afford it.

combat-gear.name: Ring Mail
combat-gear.description: Comprised of interlocking metal rings, ring mail provides solid protection but hampers stealth.

combat-gear.name: Shield
combat-gear.description: A sturdy piece of defensive equipment that can be used to block or deflect attacks, enhancing the user's armor class.
